title: Kirby Model 4C Owners Manual from 1940-1941
content:
1. Information such as the country: USA  
2. Age of the sample 1940-1941  
3. A pdf scan of the user manual can be found at [http://www.kirby.com/consumer-relations/product-manuals/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171358/http:/www.kirby.com/consumer-relations/product-manuals/ "http://www.kirby.com/consumer-relations/product-manuals/") and look for model 4C at the bottom of the page.  
4. I am trying to reproduce the old manual and would like to know the fonts used so I can re-create the manual to be as close to the original one as possible

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171358im_/http:/typophile.com/files/4C_Font_Test_5452.jpg)

Font: 

 Kabel Heavy & Bodoni 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317171358/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")
author: mbpb45

comments.content: This is perfect kthomps5! Thank you so much for all of your help!
